about_the_game:
Full soundtrack to the science fiction visual novel game Across Kiloparsecs, composed and produced by Bloodless Mushroom.

This soundtrack contains 23 tracks of ambient electronic music composed with a mix of physical hardware synthesizers and VSTs. Filled with layers and evolving atmospheres, some tracks are calming, some pensive, and some reflect a feeling of distress or agitation.
